title: Tears Of Regret?
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon discuss if Jalen Brunson is the missing piece for the Knicks and Freddie Freeman firing his agency after his return to Atlanta and getting his World Series Ring. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: PTI: Freddie Freeman fires his agency and is Brunson the missing piece?
